class.name: ir.tapsell.plus.b4a.TapsellPlusB4A
class.event: TapsellPlus_OnOpened (zoneId As String, responseId As String)
TapsellPlus_OnClosed (zoneId As String, responseId As String)
TapsellPlus_OnRewarded (zoneId As String, responseId As String)
TapsellPlus_OnResponse (zoneId As String, responseId As String)

method.name: DestroyNativeAd
method.comment: Destroys a native ad Do NOT pass ZONE_Id to this method

method.name: SetGDPRConsent
method.comment: No comments provided - Visit docs.tapsell.ir for information

method.name: RequestRewardedVideoAd
method.comment: Request a rewarded ad Note Prefer to use RequestAndShow methods instead

method.name: ShowStandardBannerAd
method.comment: Shows the requested standard banner Do NOT pass ZONE_Id to this method Note Prefer to use RequestAndShow methods instead

method.name: ShowNativeAd
method.comment: No comments provided - Visit docs.tapsell.ir for information

method.name: ShowRewardedVideo
method.comment: Show the ad. Remember. Request one first. Then use it's responseId answer

method.name: RequestAndShowInterstitialAd
method.comment: Request an interstitial ad and then immediately show it zoneId: is the zone Id needed (get it from Tapsell plus dashboard)

method.name: RequestAndShowNativeAd
method.comment: Shows a native ad inside the app's main screen. NOTE: It uses default template and custom template is not supported in B4A zoneId: is the ID of native ad in tapsell plus dashboard container: is the panel view group you make in designer for this ad. It should be 3/4 of the screen

method.name: SetDebugMode
method.comment: To see more logs set this to 3

method.name: RequestAndShowStandardBanner
method.comment: Request an interstitial ad and then immediately show it zoneId: is the zone Id needed (get it from Tapsell plus dashboard) bannerType: is the type of banner to be shown. It mostly cares about the size panel: is an empty view container to show the ad on.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize tapsell - This is needed to be called first appId: is achieved from tapsell plus dashboard when you create the app

method.name: ShowInterstitialAd
method.comment: Shows the requested interstitial method. responseId: is the ID you get from calling Request method Do NOT pass ZONE_Id to this method Note Prefer to use RequestAndShow methods instead

method.name: DestroyStandardBannerAd
method.comment: Destroys a standard banner responseId: is the ID returned in `OnResponse` from requesting an ad - Must be StandardBanner container: the panel assigned to show (or requestAndShow) method

method.name: InitializeWithEventPrefix
method.comment: Initialize tapsell - This is needed to be called first appId: is achieved from tapsell plus dashboard when you create the app eventPrefix: is the prefix name of events in b4a - default is TapsellPlus You can also call tapsellPlus.Initialize(appId) which is better

method.name: NativeAdClicked
method.comment: Used when a native ad is clicked Since you use adHolder, this is mostly useless

method.name: RequestInterstitialAd
method.comment: Requests an Interstitial ad Note Prefer to use RequestAndShow methods instead

method.name: RequestNativeAd
method.comment: No comments provided - Visit docs.tapsell.ir for information

method.name: RequestStandardBannerAd
method.comment: No comments provided - Visit docs.tapsell.ir for information

method.name: RequestAndShowNativeVideoAd
method.comment: Shows a native video ad inside the app's main screen. NOTE: It uses default template and custom template is not supported in B4A zoneId: is the ID of native video ad in tapsell plus dashboard container: is the panel view group you make in designer for this ad. It should be 3/4 of the screen

method.name: RequestAndShowRewardedVideoAd
method.comment: Request an rewarded ad and then immediately show it zoneId: is the zone Id needed (get it from Tapsell plus dashboard)

field.name: BANNER_250x250
field.comment: Used when requesting for a standard banner Supported by Tapsell only

field.name: BANNER_320x100
field.comment: Used when requesting for a standard banner Supported by Tapsell, AdMob

field.name: BANNER_320x50
field.comment: Used when requesting for a standard banner Supported by Tapsell, AdMob, AppLovin, UnityAds, AdColony

field.name: BANNER_468x60
field.comment: Used when requesting for a standard banner Supported by AdMob, UnityAds

field.name: BANNER_160x600
field.comment: Used when requesting for a standard banner Supported by AdColony only

field.name: BANNER_300x250
field.comment: Used when requesting for a standard banner Supported by Tapsell, AdMob, AppLovin, AdColony

field.name: BANNER_728x90
field.comment: Used when requesting for a standard banner Supported by AdMob, AppLovin, UnityAds, AdColony
